The '''Eminent Share Bundle''' is available as part of the [[Adventurer's Tempering Bundle]], which can be purchased in the [[Gift Shop]] section in the Shop at limited times.

One of the following can be selected upon using this item:
{{Card|Debris of Decarabian's City|1}}{{Card|Boreal Wolf's Cracked Tooth|1}}{{Card|Chains of the Dandelion Gladiator|1}}{{Card|Lustrous Stone from Guyun|1}}{{Card|Mist Veiled Mercury Elixir|1}}{{Card|Piece of Aerosiderite|1}}{{Card|Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea|1}}{{Card|Narukami's Joy|1}}{{Card|Mask of the Tiger's Bite|1}}
